story_teamaquamagma_01_07000/2401_1001_0: Whoa, hold on... What just happened?!

I hadn’t the slightest idea that this situation
could occur...

Instead of wasting our time thinking about it, let’s
go and look for them!
Er... Yeah, that makes sense. You’re right, Shelly.

I’ll instruct our team members to search around
this area.
Everyone split up and find Groudon!
story_teamaquamagma_01_07000/2401_1001_1:
I don’t care if we’re putting our name on the line.
We absolutely have to find Kyogre!
However... Who is this that’s suddenly appeared?

It prevented Pasio from sinking while Kyogre and
Groudon were rampaging.
